question: which one is wrong for packet switching?
options: each message is sent in packet
A system can communicate more than one system atthe same time with packet switching
It is ideal for phone communication

correct_answer: It is ideal for phone communication

question: Which one is not true for TCP/IP protocol architecture?
options: Port address is used for identifying each computer inthe network uniquely
TCP is the most reliable transport layer protocol
Isolating above layers from network technology isdone with Internet layer
Internet is based on TCP/IP protocols
correct_answer: Port address is used for identifying each computer inthe network uniquely

question: Which definition is not true for OSI Architecture?
options: Service ports are used in the communication between layers in the same system
For the communication between networks Internet layer is used
Same layers in different systems communicate with protocols
Communication between upper and lower layers are done with services
correct_answer: For the communication between networks Internet layer is used

question: How does delay occur in signal transmission?
options: Not reaching to receiver due to weakness of signa
Signal reaches to receiver late due to interference of another signal
Because of the thermal noise, signal transmission gets slow down
requencies in edges arrive to receiver later in cable transmission
correct_answer: requencies in edges arrive to receiver later in cable transmission

question: Which one is done by Repeater?
options: Correcting the distortion on the digital signal
Converting analog signal into digital signal
correct_answer: Correcting the distortion on the digital signal

question: Which one is true for Analog Signal?
options: Each signal has just single frequency
Providing security is more difficult than digital signal
It can be digitized without any data lost
correct_answer: Providing security is more difficult than digital signal
